pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python Client for Repustate API===============================This is a Python client to the Repustate API. You must first get an APIkey from `Repustate.com`_Here’s a simple example of how to use the Python client::: >>> import repustate >>> client = repustate.Client(api_key='YOUR_API_KEY') >>> client.sentiment(text='I want the sentiment for this lovely text') {"status":"OK", "score":0.3782}You can use the Repustate API to perform text analytics in multiplelanguages including:- Arabic- Chinese- English- French- German- Italian- Polish- Portuguese- Russian- Spanish- More coming soon ….. _Repustate.com: https://www.repustate.com
